EmailTemplate.name: VNS_GA12-010.020212
EmailTemplate.subject: GA12-010 - Microsoft Critical Security Bulletin - June 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> Technical Advisory GA12-010 - Microsoft Critical Security Bulletin - June 2012 POSTED: 06-29-12
Dear Clients,
Microsoft has released three (3) Critical Security Updates for the month of June, 2012. The vulnerabilities discussed in this bulletin involve Microsoft Windows and other Microsoft products.
You may access this advisory via the MyVisiNet Support site under Documentation | Tech Advisories | Microsoft Advisories | 2012.
Sincerely,
Tony Vardiman Technical Services Frontline Supervisor Direct: 858.799.7441 l Mobile: 619.816.7100 Fax: 858.799.7010 l Support: 800.847.4223
